INNER JOIN rules_profiles qp ON qp.id=a.profile_id INNER JOIN rules r ON r.id = a.rule_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO active_rules (profile_id, rule_id, failure_level, inheritance, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{profileId}, #{ruleId}, #{severity}, #{inheritance}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: delete from active_rules where exists ( select 1 from rules_profiles p where p.id = profile_id and p.kee in #{profileKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
